sentences.en: After you have made the appropriate changes, the brackets next to the resource will say "Unknown Language" and show the language and sublanguage identifiers.
sentences.cn: 进行适当更改之后，资源旁边的括号将显示“未知语言”，并显示语言和子语言标识符。

sentences.en: This is a sublanguage allowing navigation to nodes, retrieval of sets of nodes, and so forth.
sentences.cn: 这是一种用于遍历节点、检索节点组等的子语言。

trans.tran_cn: 次语言（指社会中某一集团或阶层专用的言语），子语言
